Title: ASP.Net MVC Crud with JqGrid
Description:
CRUD automation for .Net MVC 1.0.  Generic classes and interfaces to use for create, edit, delete, details and list in MVC.

Create a controllers and repositories in as little as 1 line!

Now includes auto generation of JqGrid !!!
